title: Replacing Go Process with exec
description: This lab focuses on replacing the current Go process with another process using Go's implementation of the classic exec function.

meta.title: Go Exec Function | Process Replacement Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to replace the current Go process with another process using Go's implementation of the classic exec function.
meta.keywords: Go programming, exec function, process replacement, process execution, environment variables

verify.name: Verify Go Program Execing Processes
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 使用exec替换Go进程

i18n.description: In diesem Lab geht es darum, den aktuellen Go-Prozess durch einen anderen Prozess zu ersetzen, indem die Go-Implementierung der klassischen exec-Funktion verwendet wird.
